original_text: When Zebul the governor of the city heard what Gaal son of Ebed said, he was very angry.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 방백 스불이 에벳의 아들 가알의 말을 듣고 노하여

sentences.original_text: When Zebul the governor of the city heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시의 총독 스불이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: what Gaal son of Ebed said
